A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: What on Kashyyyk were they thinking\, that flying Leia scene\, that whole Casino theme\, the most bland space chase ever\, Luke being nothing like he was supposed to...nothing works! Full of agendas and no room left for the stories that the previous episode set up. the only good parts is the very brief team up fight with Kylo and Rey\, and some cool visuals...rest is terrible.
